title: Fluid SE
description:
"A fast-paced and relentlessly hard racer, Fluid SE is well worth your time. 8 out of 10" - PocketGamer

Fluid SE is a thrilling time-trial racer mixed with the arcade gameplay of Pac-Man, brought to you by Radiangames, creator of Inferno+, JoyJoy, Super Crossfire, and more. Speed through the mazes to collect the dots, find the optimal path, and avoid the swarms of spectres.

In Fluid: Special Edition, you guide Streak (a speedy black fish) through 40 levels filled with dots, obstacles, and powerups. Each dot you collect spawns a spectre that tries to chase you down, while the powerups give you a temporary upperhand, either with a speed boost, a vortex, or spectre-bursting spikes.

* Finish the levels as fast you can and you're rewarded with up to 5 stars.

* Levels are unlocked in groups, with each group requiring a minimum amount of stars.

* Includes bonus and turbo levels.

* 5-star times aren't initially shown, but getting a 4-star or higher time will reveal that level's 5-star time.

* Track your progress with 12 achievements.

* Amazingly smooth and accurate controls.

releases.cert_subject: C = US, O = Android, CN = Android Debug

products.name: Fluid SE
products.description: This is the full game, no other purchases required.
